channel.title: Need help with ::yell command
channel.description:
i have it where if u say .no-ip it says imgay but that doesnt work on my server it still lets them say it......
i was wondering if i could make it so if u do say .no-ip it blocks it from the yell command
thanks, master guard[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2008, 11:47:29 AM[/size][hr]plz someone?

item.title: Need help with ::yell command
item.dc:creator: @HOT_babe HOT babe
item.description:
@HOT_babe wrote:

if it wont work you need to try ctrl+h add no-ip and add your text in other text box ant click replace all… that should work…
